full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 177 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct 1 Special Agent Maguire was going to offer that I don't believe is being objected to. 2 Never mind, your Honor, I'm being told -- never mind. 3 THE COURT: All right. 4 With respect to the items, either the physical items 5 or the photographs of the school costumes, as I indicated - and 6 I think the ruling I'm making now is fully consistent with that 7 - it has to be tied through a witness as to similarity of items 8 seen at the time. And that was what I ruled before about 9 those, which is why you can lay the foundation through Maguire, 10 and if it's temporally tied back, I imagine I would admit it, 11 depending on that testimony; same theory here. 12 MR. EVERDELL: Yes, your Honor. 13 MS. COMEY: Understood, your Honor. Thank you. 14 THE COURT: All right. 15 Are these for me or for the witness? 16 MR. EVERDELL: Those are for you, your Honor. 17 THE COURT: Okay. Thank you. 18 MR. EVERDELL: It should be three, for the next three 19 witnesses. Sorry I couldn't get one for your Honor's deputy. 20 THE COURT: All right. So we can bring the witness 21 back and we can get the jury. 22 THE WITNESS: Good afternoon, your Honor. 23 THE COURT: Good afternoon, Mr. Parkinson. You may 24 take your seat. Thank you. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012691
